commit message: Initial commit
Add GPLv3 LICENSE file and notices to the start of each file

Add Travis CI config file

build.gradle has also been modified to prevent build to fail when lint
errors are detected.
Set accent color to orange
Prevent wifiPasswordDialog from reappearing on screen rotation
Set QR code width to 200 dp
Prevent crash on startup when Wi-Fi is not yet fully activated

Save user-entered passwords to database

When no root access is given, the app asks the user to manually enter the password for protected networks.
Those passwords are saved to a local database so that he won't have to enter again after app closes.
Add key/missing key icon for each item in the networks list
Add Travis CI build status image
Add app launcher icon
Remove padding in Wi-Fi list content layout

Remove FloatingActionButton in Wi-Fi list activity as we currently don't use it

FAB may be re-added in the future if we find it useful (add new network/scan QR code/scan NFC tag/â€¦)
Check that NFC is enabled/available before reading/writing tag
Remove NFC foreground dispatch and enable Android Beam in Wi-Fi network activity
Move isValidPasswordLength to static isValidKeyLength method in WifiNetwork class
Do not set password restrictions in EditText until we know exactly what are the restrictions for WEP/WPA passwords
Ellipsize long SSIDs in list

Disable app data backup

Prevent saved Wi-Fi keys to be sent to Google without user knowing it.
Extract hardcoded strings to string resources
Escape apostrophe in strings
Remove unused AddWifiDialog class and all its resources (layout, strings, styles, arrays)
Show 'No root' dialog only on first run
Add checkbox to show/hide password

Show context menu on long tap on Wi-Fi list item allowing to clear saved password

RecyclerView has been replaced by a custom sub-class of it (ContextMenuRecyclerView)
that is able to detect which item was clicked.

See http://stackoverflow.com/a/31478593

Re-enable NFC foreground dispatch in WifiNetworkActivity as we need it to write tags

Partially revert changes made in commit #1571dd2.
Add About dialog box with app description, license and credits
Move hardcoded string to string resources
Remove scroll flag from Toolbar
Add 'Write to tag' image in NfcFragment
Add missing 'Write to tag' image in resources
Do not show toast when reading a tag
Add option to view password after long tap on network
Show 'Clear saved password' in context menu dialog only when device is not rooted
Remove WifiNetwork argument from NfcFragment as it is not used
Add open and close methods to WifiKeysDataSource and use them in activities
Use dismiss() instead of hide() on alert dialog to prevent leaked window

Add drawables for other screen densities

PNG's where optimized with the optipng tool

Show a 'Connect to Wi-Fi network?' dialog when scanning an application/vnd.wfa.wsc tag

The dialog is taken from the AOSP source code. For now, the default Android
confirmation dialog is shown on devices running Android 5.0+ (except when in
WifiNetworkActivity), and our own dialog is shown on all other devices running
Android 4.4 and before.
Check that parsed WifiConfiguration is not null
Follow Wi-Fi Simple Configuration Technical Specification
Return WPA2_* by default instead of WPA_*
Try to be more precise when parsing WPA/WPA2 security from WifiConfiguration

Prevent BufferUnderflowException in NfcUtils#parse(NdefMessage). Fixes #1.

The previous code did not take the value of other fields into
account when looping through the payload.
This is a bug to report to the AOSP, from which the original code
comes from.
Make ConfirmConnectToWifiNetworkActivity dialog fully transparent
Check that the scanned tag is of type application/vnd.wfa.wsc
Fix authentication type field in QR code string
Use enum name() in code and toString() for a more user-friendly name
Re-arrange strings (order, naming, etc.)
Add French translation
Disable 'Write to tag' button for WEP networks
Use custom exception with error code to ease i18n
Remove useless debug code
Reword no root dialog title
Show button to launch NFC settings if NFC is deactivated
Add wifikeysha.re URL in About dialog
Remove EAP networks from Wi-Fi list
Center 'write to tag' image in layout
Automatically rename release APK's
